abstract: Defying all expectations of failure, India staged its inaugural Grand Prix without a serious glitch, while Sebastian Vettel won, taking his 11th race of the season.
snippet: Defying all expectations of failure, India staged its inaugural Grand Prix without a serious glitch, while Sebastian Vettel won, taking his 11th race of the season.

headline.main: India Wins, as Vettel Leads From Start to Finish
